title: Super Hot Kissing Pics Of Ex-Lovers Madhuri Dixit And Sanjay Dutt
text:
Posted by: Priyanka Prasad Published: Wednesday, October 14, 2015, 18:11 [IST] 
Sanjay Dutt had one complicated life! No wonder Rajkumar Hirani is making a biopic on him with Ranbir Kapoor playing the lead.Sanjay Baba has pretty much dealt with every aspect of life, from drug addiction, loss of his parents, loss of his wife, love affairs, failed marriage to TADA case.While drug addiction and TADA case did make him feature in the newspapers, it was his alleged love affair with Madhuri Dixit that got him immense attention. 
Throwback: Childhood Pics Of Mira Rajput, Shahid Kapoor's Wife They became the hottest, most loved couple of Bollywood in the 90's, during which they starred in a number of movies together and shared many candid moments that got captured by the media shutterbugs.It is said that with the TADA case, Madhuri moved on from Sanju Baba and never turned back. A couple whose love blossomed when Madhuri had taken a career hiatus and had nursed Sanjay from loss of his wife, soon became ex-lovers who never bothered to even keep in touch.While industry insiders confirmed their relationship, Madhuri never did! She said, "Well, I don't know what fuels people's imaginations. I can't talk about what others are feeling or thinking in their heads? We just happened to do many movies simultaneously like 'Khalnayak' and 'Thanedaar' that perhaps kept the rumour mills abuzz."Ignoring Madhuri's denial, let us check out some romantic moments shared by the actors in the 90's.
